img_above_text:
![Foothills Walkthrough \(67\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/1/12/Foothills_Walkthrough_%2867%29.png)
You can then detransform and follow up with your own strong attacks and it will continue to burn for a while until it douses itself off with the water.
img_below_text: As its health starts to get low, it will dive into the water and behave similarly to Jiao-Loong of Waves, where it will try to dive up and catch you by surprise. You'll see it emerge and peek up before it disappears again and the ground begins to rumble. You'll be able to see ripples in the water, that show you the exact path the beast is taking to reach you.
summary_promot:
You are shown an image extracted from a video game walkthrough or guide.


        
        Context:
        - Preceding Text: "![Foothills Walkthrough \(67\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/1/12/Foothills_Walkthrough_%2867%29.png)
You can then detransform and follow up with your own strong attacks and it will continue to burn for a while until it douses itself off with the water."
        - Following Text: "As its health starts to get low, it will dive into the water and behave similarly to Jiao-Loong of Waves, where it will try to dive up and catch you by surprise. You'll see it emerge and peek up before it disappears again and the ground begins to rumble. You'll be able to see ripples in the water, that show you the exact path the beast is taking to reach you."

        Your task:
        1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
        2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.
        3. Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.
img_summary: The image depicts a scene from a video game where a character is engaged in combat with a burning, tree-like creature emerging from the water. The surrounding environment includes a forested area and a calm water body. This moment appears to be part of a strategy to exploit the creature's vulnerability, as described in the preceding text, where it is set on fire and continues to burn until it douses itself in the water. The following text suggests the creature will later use the water to launch surprise attacks.
